title: The Essential Guide To India (3-Disc)
description:
The Essential Guide To India (3-Disc)

MP3/320



Disc 1: Bollywood Gold


1. Pyar Kiya To Darna Kya (Edit) - Lata Mangeshkar

2. Saawan Ka Mahina - Lata Mangeshkar

3. Chura Liya Hai Tum Ne - Asha Bhosle/Shamshad Begum/Mohammed Rafi

4. De De Pyar De - Kishore Kumar

5. Streets Of Calcutta - Ananda Shankar

6. Aye Meri Zohra Jabeen - Manna Dey

7. Baat Meri Suniye To Zaea - Various Artists

8. In Aankhon Ki Masti - Asha Bhosle

9. Main Yamla Jat - Various Artists

10. Mera Joota Hai Japani - Mukesh

11. Chadh Gayo Papi Bichhua - Lata Mangeshkar

12. Ek Ladki Ko Dekha - Kumar Sanu


Disc 2: Classic Acoustic


1. Parvanon - Najma

2. Children Of Bharati - Various Artists

3. Vo Kuch - Kiran Ahluwalia

4. Kabhi To Khul Ke Baras - Chitra Singh

5. Rag Pahadi - Shivkumar Sharma

6. Rainbows Adorn You - Amjad Ali Khan

7. Na Main Dharmi Na Hi Adharmi - Lata Mangeshkar

8. Reflection - Ravi Shankar

9. Punjabi Dhun - Ustad Vilayat Khan

10. Ghanashyam Aya Re - M.S. Subbulakshmi

11. Thillana (Kannada) - Lalgudi Jayaraman

12. Kajri Dhunin Kaharwa Taal - Bismillah Khan


Disc 3: Desi Beats & Beyond...


1. Bindiya Chamke Gi - Gunjan

2. Nahin Jeena - Various Artists

3. The Last Gospel - Fun-da-mental

4. Raanjhan - Midival Punditz

5. Jaan - Talvin Singh

6. Milan - Karsh Kale

7. Mundian To Bach Ke - Various Artists

8. Lak Noo Haleda - Achanak

9. Ishq Jise Ho Jaaye - Sukhwinder Singh

10. Aaj Jane Ki Zid Na Karo - Asha Bhosle

11. Mausam - Nitin Sawhney

12. Bombay Theme Music - A.R. Rahman


All MP3 tracks have ID3 tags for Album, Artist, Track Titles, and order in the album.  Some other information, such as Year, Genre, and Publisher may have been added if the information was available to me.

FLAC cannot be encoded by my software in a usable fashion with tags, so you must add them yourself. 

All albums will have album art included if it was available to me.

All MP3 files that I upload are encoded at TRUE 320 kbps.

All FLAC files that I upload are encoded at highest quality.  If the files seem a little large, that is why. 

If you have any problems, comments, or suggestions, let me know.
